Package com.snapon.sbs.dns.mailer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutostartServlet
    The AutostartServlet provides a mechanism for starting arbitrary threads when the webapp is started.
    EmailImageServlet
    This servlet will be called to pull images from the database dependant on the tag that is contained in the email.
    MailerDAO
    Class to help pass jobs objects to and from the database.
    MailerService
    This class polls the EMAIL_JOB table for new jobs and if it finds any that have not yet started, will pass them to a mailer handler.
    TrackingServlet
    This class outputs an image file which is embedded in every email and used for tracking when the user opened the email.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MailerHandlerStatus
    Defines the various handler statuses
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidStateException
